description technical detail:
Lenovo ThinkVision LT1712p - 17" LED-backlit LCD Monitor
The ThinkVision LT1712p provides great ownership experience at an affordable price. It prides in the high standards for environmental safety and energy efficiency as it is an ENERGY STAR 6.0 (draft 3.0) compliant monitor. It offers VGA and DVI inputs with tilt and lift stand functions for a customized working environment. Users looking for a single solution suitable for a variety of business environments will value this versatile monitor.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
features: Security lock slot (cable lock sold separately)
osd languages: Chinese (simplified), English, German, French, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Japanese
